sentences.sContent: He assured her that he would be discreet.
sentences.sCn: 他向她保证会谨慎行事。

sentences.sContent: I stood back at a discreet distance.
sentences.sCn: 我谨慎地保持一段距离站在后面。

trans.tranOther: careful about what you say or do, so that you do not offend, upset, or embarrass people or tell secrets
